txt.en: 'Gird your loins and pull up your socks, [placeholder], for this will not be easy!\n\n'TBD: LIGHT THE TORCH IN A DRAKE'S FIRE HOTSPOT, THEN CHANNEL IT TO THE TORCH-ROOM, DNG_MORIA_EASTERNLEVELS_SHADOWMAP, PLACE TORCH IN SCONCE.'

Geirfast recommends bringing an ally or two along for the lighting and placing of the torch. \n\nHe left the torch just inside the entrance of the cave described in the strange map, which contains esoteric instructions for its lighting.
The strange light of the torch has projected a map onto the wall
The torch has lit up a map on the wall
Bring the torch to wherever it needs to be, further within the little cave.
Find a sconce or resting place for the torch
Carry the torch's light into the innermost chamber.
